mapper.insert: insert into t_common_code (code_group, code_value, code_name, code_description, disp_order, ins_seq, ins_dt) values (#{codeGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispOrder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select code_group, code_value, code_name, code_description, disp_order, ins_seq, ins_dt from t_common_code where code_group = #{codeGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select code_group, code_value, code_name, code_description, disp_order, ins_seq, ins_dt from t_common_code
